mapper.update: insert into fund_group_index(fund_group_id, fund_group_sub_id, historical_annual_yield,historical_annual_volatility) VALUES (#{fundGroupId},#{fundGroupSubId},#{historicalAnnualYield},#{historicalAnnualVolatility}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE historical_annual_yield = #{historicalAnnualYield}, historical_annual_volatility = #{historicalAnnualVolatility}
